trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture" /> 事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: The strokes that represent the possible gesture.
trans-unit.target: 筆劃代表的可能筆勢。

trans-unit.source: The results from the gesture recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 筆勢辨識器的結果。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether strokes should be considered a gesture.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定布林值，這個值表示是否要將筆劃視為筆勢。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the strokes are ink; <see langword="false" /> if the strokes are a gesture.
trans-unit.target: 如果筆劃是筆墨，則為 <see langword="true" />; 如果筆劃是筆勢，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture> event occurs, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property depends on the first <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult> in the collection returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.GetGestureRecognitionResults%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture>事件發生時，值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性相依於第一個<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult>所傳回的集合中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.GetGestureRecognitionResults%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.ApplicationGesture%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.NoGesture>, or if it is a gesture whose <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A> is a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence.Strong>, then <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Cancel%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.ApplicationGesture%2A>屬性是<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.NoGesture>，或者如果它是筆勢其<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A>以外是值<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence.Strong>，然後<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Cancel%2A>是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Cancel%2A> is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Cancel%2A> 為 `false`。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Cancel%2A> is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> adds the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Strokes%2A> to its <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Cancel%2A>是`false`、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>新增<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Strokes%2A>至其<xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Cancel%2A> is `true`, the strokes are not added to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Cancel%2A>是`true`，筆劃不會加入至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。

trans-unit.source: Returns results from the gesture recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 從筆勢辨識器傳回結果。

trans-unit.source: A collection of possible application gestures that the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Strokes" /> might be.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Strokes" /> 可能成為的應用程式筆勢集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.GetGestureRecognitionResults%2A> method is sorted by the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回的集合<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.GetGestureRecognitionResults%2A>方法依照<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.GetGestureRecognitionResults%2A> might return a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult> objects with the following values:
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.GetGestureRecognitionResults%2A>可能會傳回的集合<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult>物件具有下列值：

trans-unit.source: Index
trans-unit.target: 索引

trans-unit.source: ApplicationGesture
trans-unit.target: ApplicationGesture

trans-unit.source: RecognitionConfidence
trans-unit.target: RecognitionConfidence

trans-unit.source: This means that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> recognizes that it is very likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is a check mark, relatively likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> in not a gesture, and not at all likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is a curlicue or a double curlicue.
trans-unit.target: 這表示，<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>就很可能是可辨識的<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>核取記號，可能會相當的<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>中不鍵筆勢，和完全不可能，<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>花體或 double 花體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.GetGestureRecognitionResults%2A> method can return an array with <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.NoGesture> with a higher degree of <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> than it has for other application gestures.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.GetGestureRecognitionResults%2A>方法可以傳回的陣列<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.NoGesture>具有較高程度的<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>比它具有的其他應用程式的筆勢。

trans-unit.source: This means that it is more likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is not a gesture, as opposed to a gesture that has a lower <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>.
trans-unit.target: 這表示很有可能，<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>不鍵筆勢，而不是具有較低的軌跡<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>。

trans-unit.source: The generic handler / delegate implementation to be invoked.
trans-unit.target: 要叫用的泛型處理常式/委派實作。

trans-unit.source: The target on which the provided handler should be invoked.
trans-unit.target: 應該在其上叫用所提供處理常式的目標。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, provides a way to invoke event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase efficiency over the base implementation.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，提供以特定類型方式叫用事件處理常式的方式，這可透過基底實作來提高效率。

trans-unit.source: Gets the strokes that represent the possible gesture.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來表示可能筆勢的筆劃。

trans-unit.source: The strokes that represent the possible gesture.
trans-unit.target: 筆劃代表的可能筆勢。
